mapper.select: select * from schedule where date=#{date} order by date asc,schedule_start_time asc,schedule_end_time asc
select * from schedule where YEARWEEK(date) = YEARWEEK(#{date}) order by date asc,schedule_start_time asc,schedule_end_time asc
select * from schedule where DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m') order by date asc,schedule_start_time asc,schedule_end_time asc
select * from schedule where date=#{date} and doctor_id=#{doctorId}
